INSERT /* com.greedy.waterfall.board.model.mapper.MeetingMapper#registMeetingBoard() */ INTO TBL_BOARD A ( A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_STATUS , A.PROJECT_NO , A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , A.MEMBER_NO , A.BOARD_COUNT ) VALUES ( BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL , SYSDATE , #{ title } , #{ content } , 'Y' , 3 , 4 , 1 , 0 )
SELECT BOARD_NO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.greedy.waterfall.board.model.mapper.MeetingMapper#findMeetingBoardDetail() */ A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_STATUS , A.PROJECT_NO , A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , A.BOARD_UPDATED_DATE , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , C.FILE_NO , C.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME , C.FILE_PATH FROM TBL_BOARD A LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_FILE C ON(A.BOARD_NO = C.REF_BOARD_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO = 4 AND A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_NO = #{ meetingNo }

SELECT /* com.greedy.waterfall.board.model.mapper.MeetingMapper#findMeetingTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A
JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO)
B.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
A.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
A.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO = 4 AND A.PROJECT_NO = #{ projectNo }
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.greedy.waterfall.board.model.mapper.MeetingMapper#removeMeetingBoard() */ FROM TBL_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO = 4 AND A.BOARD_NO = #{ meetingNo }
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.greedy.waterfall.board.model.mapper.MeetingMapper#findOneMeetingBoard() */ A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_UPDATED_DATE , A.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_STATUS , A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , A.PROJECT_NO , A.MEMBER_NO FROM TBL_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_NO = #{ meetingNo }

SELECT /* com.greedy.waterfall.board.model.mapper.MeetingMapper#fineFile() */ A.FILE_NO , A.FILE_PATH , A.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME , A.FILE_RANDOM_NAME , A.FILE_STATUS , A.REF_ISSUE_NO , A.REF_TASK_NO , A.REF_BOARD_NO , A.FILE_CATEGORY_NO FROM TBL_FILE A WHERE A.FILE_NO = #{ no }

SELECT /* com.greedy.waterfall.board.model.mapper.MeetingMapper#findMainList() */ ROWNUM , A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_UPDATED_DATE , A.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_STATUS , A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , A.PROJECT_NO , A.MEMBER_NO FROM TBL_BOARD A WHERE A.PROJECT_NO = #{ projectNo }
AND ROWNUM <= 6
